review_title: I have never dreaded going to work here !
job_title: Registered Pharmacy Technician in Worcester, MA
pros: I get to see our patients get well ! It’s the best feeling ever! Management always make you feel appreciated.
cons: We are a start up so there’s been bumps.

review_title: if you need a job its a place to start
job_title: Hospital Unit Clerk in Worcester, MA
pros: i loved the NP and the other staff i worked with.
cons: Uppermanagement is awful! mean and very clicky. they make everyones job hell

pros: You learn new things for sure…

review_title: Good for future clinicians to gain experience short-term.
job_title: Mental Health Technician in Worcester, MA
pros: Good experience for future licensed clinicians in the field (to work while in school).
cons: The work environment can be very unprofessional. I would definitely not recommend working here if you’re looking for something long-term.

pros: Supervisors are great and appreciate the work you do! made some friends here but ...
cons: half the staff is lazy and rude..

review_title: Start up hospital that needs help
pros:
The team of people I work with
being able to assist a population in need
Salary
being a part of a start up is a fantastic and challenging experience
cons:
Lack of strong leadership
Employees that don't care about how well they do their jobs

pros: Adequate space and physical set up
Great group of employees looking to make a difference in peoples lives.
cons: Still working out kinks, start-ups in healthcare are difficult.
